text: Sano naga jwalijose mwa achiwammakwenu ali antisile kuja kumakafili (ni m'bilasisye mahari genu nambo akanyisye), kaneka ni mpatile chipanje (cha makafilio chachawajilwe kwauchisya pa achiwammakwao wawatisile kapena chinchipatile petala lyangondo), basi mwapani awala waatisile achiwammakwao yakulandana ni yawatosile (pakulombela). Soni mun'jogopani Allah Ajula jwankuwa nkunkulupilila
